sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_email"><sys_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><blind_copied/><body><html><head></head><body><p>Hello,</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>A new incident, INC0010011, with Impact: 1 - High, Urgency: 1 - High, and Priority: 1 - Critical has been created.</p>
<p>Please address this incident as soon as possible.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>Thank you!</p><div>&nbsp;</div><div style="display:inline">Ref:MSG0000710_UgNz5y29BOCm6n63Qfkh</div></body></html></body><body_text/><checkpoint>0</checkpoint><content_type>text/html</content_type><copied/><deleted>false</deleted><direct>networkingoperations@example.com</direct><error_string/><headers>X-ServiceNow-Source:Notification-f9d0cb069f8722107f4460e2b824abc0
List-Unsubscribe:<mailto:?body=Sending+this+email+with+the+predefined+content+in+the+subject+and+body+will+unsubscribe+you+from+the+notification.%0D%0A%0D%0AUnsubscribe%3A%7B%22id%22%3A%22f9d0cb069f8722107f4460e2b824abc0%22%2C%22token%22%3A%22c797e62132%22%7D
 &subject=Unsubscribe+from+%22High+Priority+Network+Incident%22>
X-ServiceNow-SysEmail-Version:2
</headers><importance>high</importance><instance>d9d02c529f4322107f4460e2b824ab2d</instance><mailbox display_value="Outbox">outbox</mailbox><message_id/><notification_type>SMTP</notification_type><receive_type>new</receive_type><recipients>networkingoperations@example.com</recipients><reply_to/><state>ready</state><status/><subject>High Priority Network Incident</subject><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-01 02:09:46</sys_created_on><sys_id>4531e8929f4322107f4460e2b824abd8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-01 02:09:46</sys_updated_on><target_table>incident</target_table><type>send-ready</type><uid>N/A</uid><user/><user_id/><weight>0</weight></sys_email></record_update>
